episodes.title: Therapist Discusses the Dangers of Mental Health Coaching #scaminterview
episodes.description:
In this video, I sit down with Licensed Therapist, Juliet Rowsey, to discuss the risks of coaches who claim to be able to heal trauma and mental health. As the popularity of life coaching grows, so do cases of unqualified coaches stepping into roles they’re simply not trained for. We discuss the red flags to watch out for, why mental health support must be left to licensed professionals, and the impact on individuals who have unknowingly sought “therapy” from life coaches outside their scope.

If you’ve ever been unsure about a coach’s qualifications or feel frustrated with the coaching industry’s blurred lines, this conversation is for you. Remember, real mental health support comes from real professionals.

#pyramidscheme #coachingscam #traumacoach

episodes.title: She Lost Her Mom to Manifestation #scamstory
episodes.description:
In this video, I sit down to read a story submitted by a subscriber who recounts her experience losing her mom to the self help guru girl bosses of the internet. What began as an innocent attempt to start a journey to self-improvement quickly spiralled into an inability to keep touch with reality. Listen as the viewer details the heartbreaking experience of losing her mother to the pseudoscientific manifestation believers with little hope of resolution. 

#pyramidscheme #coachingscam #manifestation

episodes.title: Is This a Wellness Retreat or a Cult? #livereact
episodes.description:
In this livestream we will be taking a look into a self-proclaimed "period whisperer" & life coach offering '3 Day Immersive Retreats' claiming to be able to heal your trauma and clear everything holding you back from the life you want. If I haven't provided enough proof of the need for proper regulation in the life coaching industry, this might be the video that does it. Join us as we sit down together to debunk these harmful practices being masked and marketed as "life changing opportunities".

Watch@KeyasWorld video: https://youtu.be/rjSed86Ey7Q?si=ir8rkp6N3YElsMT_
